Detailed Description

Loader of Mobile Dragon Model (MDM) file class.

Member Data Documentation

vector< ObjRef<Basic3D> > out_of_portals
 

List of objects, that not linked to the rooms and portals.

If scene is static and has portal system, this list will contain all objects which are not linked to the Room and Portal objects.

vector< ObjRef<Portal> > portals
 

List of Portal objects.

If scene is static and has portal system, this list will contain all Portal objects from this scene.

vector< ObjRef<Room> > rooms
 

List of Room objects.

If scene is static and has portal system, this list will contain all Room objects from this scene.
